text: Just Married is a 2003 American romantic comedy movie. It was directed by Shawn Levy and was produced by Robert Simonds and Lauren Shuler Donner. Just Married was released on January 10, 2003. The movie gained negative reviews from critics and holds a 19% rating on Rotten Tomatoes. At the 2004 Golden Raspberry Awards, Ashton Kutcher was nominated for Worst Actor, Brittany Murphy was nominated for Worst Supporting Actress and both Kutcher and Murphy were nominated for Worst Screen Couple. They did not win any of the awards they were nominated for. == Cast == * Ashton Kutcher as Tom Leezak * Brittany Murphy as Sarah Leezak * Christian Kane as Peter Prentiss * David Moscow as Kyle * Mon√©t Mazur as Lauren * David Rasche as Mr. Dan McNerney * Veronica Cartwright as Mrs. McNerney aka Pussy * Thad Luckinbill as Willie McNerney * David Agranov as Paul McNerney * Taran Killam as Dickie McNerney * Raymond J.
